REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2244 reute d f BC-UNITED-TELECOM-<UT>-U 03-31 0045

TEXT.TITLE: UNITED TELECOM <UT> UNIT NAMES NEW PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: United Telecommunications Inc said it has named Robert Benders president and chief executive officer of its Megatek Corp unit. Benders succeeds Paul Huber at those positions, the company said. Reuter
